title: PerfStar NET 10.0 investments
body:
### Context
Let's invest into PerfStar infrastructure. 
* Justification: see https://dev.azure.com/devdiv/DevDiv/_workitems/edit/2057021
* Link to onepager PR: https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/11045
* Work tracking:  https://github.com/orgs/dotnet/projects/473

The NET 10 investment should consist of 2 parts:
 - Finalizing PerfStar V1, which includes fixing current CI bugs and PowerBI report.
 - Working on improvements with high value/effort rate.
